Comments_List: Fundamental concepts within data analysis and statistical inference, as well as basic practical training with STATA
Basic Stata skills and statistical knowledge

Course was very well organized. Power Point presentations were some of the best I've seen.  The instruction from the professor was very clear and accessible.  The content in the readings was not as easy to comprehend.

Class materials are articulated in a very clear and easily-understood way; the instructor is very helpful;
maybe some systematic compilation of useful Stata codes would be helpful.
Yes. The course is a very good introduction to statistical analysis.
Yes! Very good intro to stats for soc sciences students
